message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This innovative solution is designed to revolutionize your operations and significantly increase your efficiency and profitability. We believe its value far exceeds $1200000, but considering the current market conditions and your potential needs, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. We understand that this might be a substantial investment for you, which is why we're also providing a comprehensive 3-year maintenance and support package free of charge. This ensures that you'll have peace of mind knowing that any issues or updates will be handled by our dedicated team. Let's discuss how we can tailor this offer to meet your specific requirements and maximize the return on your investment.

Thank you for the detailed offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on your product, I must consider my budget constraints. I am willing to pay up to $1200000 for the product, including the 3-year maintenance and support package. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
